data.content:
Động từ
làm sụt giá (tiền tệ)
làm giảm giá trị
criticism that devalues our work
lời phê phán làm giảm giá trị công trình của chúng tôi

verb
-ues; -ued; -uing
finance :to lower the value of a country's money so that it is worth less when it is traded with another country's money [+ obj]
The government has decided to devalue its currency. [no obj]
Economic woes forced the government to devalue.
[+ obj] :to cause (something or someone) to seem or to be less valuable or important
He argues that placing too many requirements on schools devalues the education they provide.
Domestic work is often devalued. [=undervalued]
